author: FireAndRescueAcademy
description: Synchronize Missionchief alliance members with Discord, verification workflow with review UI, queue with auto-retry, retro linking and auto-prune.
install_msg: MemberSync loaded. Use `[p]membersync status` to verify configuration.
end_user_data_statement: Stores verification links between Discord IDs and Missionchief IDs, plus queue state, in the bot's local data folder.
